item.description:
All,

Last week, in the pouring rain, was a lot of fun! I don't believe a downpour is forecasted for this weekend, however I'm sure we'll still have fun.

You are welcome to join us regardless of your skill level. Even if you have never played flag-football you are welcome. We have a wide range of skilled people. If you feel the urge to play football, please join us.

From the T: Get off at the Alewife station. Follow the signs toward 'Rindge Ave'. Look for the Football field (stadium lights, grandstand, field house, turf field). See you there.

-Frank
item.how_to_find_us: Ex: I'll be the guy in the back with a Meetup t-shirt
item.name: SAT 3PM - FLAG FOOTBALL - RUSSELL FIELD
